publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5142 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to St Kenneth’s Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates St Kenneth’s Primary School in Greenock for its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report, having received three very good ratings and two good ratings, and notes that the school’s maritime history project, for which pupils produced informative leaflets on the shipbuilding history of the Clyde that were distributed at a local museum, was also praised in the report.

S3M-5142 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to St Kenneth’s Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates St Kenneth’s Primary School in Greenock for its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report, having received three very good ratings and two good ratings, and notes that the school’s maritime history project, for which pupils produced informative leaflets on the shipbuilding history of the Clyde that were distributed at a local museum, was also praised in the report.
S3M-5142 Congratulations to St Kenneth’s Primary School (lodged on 5 November 2009) Jim Hume*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-5142 Congratulations to St Kenneth’s Primary School (lodged on 5 November 2009) Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-5142 Congratulations to St Kenneth’s Primary School (lodged on 5 November 2009) Gil Paterson*, Robert Brown*
